page.title: 06Blacksmith in Spaxton.
page.content: Mr.Selby is the village blacksmith.His smithy is part of his house,which is about 100 years old. Mr. Selby makes things out of iron and steel for people.He makes horse shoes into door knockers,gates for farms,and today he was making gates for Peart Hall.He made a light for the carol singers at church,and a base and rings for our new maypole. He makes tools for himself and also buys tools at a local hardware store. He has roughly 20 customers a week. He designs and makes things that people want.He has lots of different tools to use. He has 415 volts of electric power in the workshop,more than in the house.
